career.description: Below are the career roles a candidate can explore after completing B. Tech in Data Science from top engineering college in Dehradun:

faqs.question: What is Data Science?
faqs.answer: Data Science focuses on building systems that can analyze large amounts of data, learn from it, and make intelligent decisions. These technologies allow machines to recognize patterns, predict outcomes, and improve performance automatically over time.

faqs.question: What is B.Tech in Data Science?
faqs.answer: B.Tech in Data Science is a 4-year undergraduate engineering program focused on designing intelligent systems and data-driven applications. Core subjects include: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Data Science, Natural Language Processing (NLP), Computer Vision, and Python & Programming Fundamentals. Skills gained: Coding and algorithm design, Data analysis and modeling, Problem-solving and logical thinking, Building intelligent applications.

faqs.question: What is the scope of B.Tech in Data Science?
faqs.answer: Graduates can pursue careers such as: AI Engineer, Machine Learning Engineer, Data Scientist, NLP Engineer, Computer Vision Engineer, Robotics Engineer, Business Intelligence Analyst.

faqs.question: Is Data Science better than CSE?
faqs.answer: Both CSE and Data Science have strong global demand and excellent career opportunities. CSE focuses on core computing, software development, and system design, while Data Science specializes in intelligent systems and data-driven technologies. The choice depends on individual interests, as both fields are equally valuable and future-ready.
